items.title: Yellow Cockatiel
items.description: Friendly birds with an attitude. These charming cockatiels are known for their playful personalities and beautiful yellow crests.

items.title: African Grey Parrot
items.description: Highly intelligent and talkative parrots. Known for their exceptional ability to mimic human speech and solve puzzles.

items.title: Budgerigar (Budgie)
items.description: Small, colorful, and social parakeets perfect for beginners. Easy to care for and delightful companions.

items.title: Lovebird Pair
items.description: Affectionate and vibrant small parrots that bond strongly with their partners. Sold as bonded pairs.

items.title: Canary
items.description: Beautiful singing birds with melodious voices. Perfect for those who enjoy bird song.

items.title: Zebra Finch
items.description: Hardy and social small birds with distinctive zebra-like markings. Great for small aviaries.

items.title: Blue Macaw
items.description: Stunning large parrots with brilliant blue plumage. Intelligent and require experienced handlers.

items.title: Green Parakeet
items.description: Vibrant green parakeets with playful dispositions. Enjoy social interaction and learning tricks.

items.title: Diamond Dove
items.description: Gentle and quiet doves perfect for peaceful environments. Easy to care for and beautiful to watch.

items.title: Conure
items.description: Energetic and colorful medium-sized parrots. Very social and love to play and interact.

items.title: Persian Kitten
items.description: Fluffy long-haired kittens with sweet, gentle personalities. Known for their luxurious coats and calm demeanor.

items.title: British Shorthair
items.description: Stocky and round-faced cats with plush coats. Easy-going and great with families.

items.title: Siamese Cat
items.description: Elegant cats with striking blue eyes and color-pointed coats. Very vocal and social.

items.title: Maine Coon
items.description: Large, friendly cats with tufted ears and bushy tails. Gentle giants of the cat world.

items.title: Domestic Shorthair Kitten
items.description: Adorable mixed breed kittens with diverse colors and patterns. Healthy and playful companions.

items.title: Ragdoll Cat
items.description: Docile and affectionate cats that go limp when picked up. Perfect lap cats with beautiful blue eyes.

items.title: Bengal Kitten
items.description: Wild-looking cats with leopard-like spots. Active, playful, and athletic companions.

items.title: Scottish Fold
items.description: Unique cats with folded ears and round faces. Sweet-natured and adaptable to various living situations.

items.title: Russian Blue
items.description: Elegant grey cats with emerald green eyes. Quiet, intelligent, and form strong bonds with owners.

items.title: Tabby Cat
items.description: Classic striped or spotted cats with M-shaped forehead markings. Friendly and adaptable personalities.

items.title: Golden Retriever Puppy
items.description: Friendly and intelligent puppies known for their gentle temperament. Perfect family dogs.

items.title: French Bulldog
items.description: Compact, muscular dogs with bat-like ears. Affectionate, playful, and great for apartment living.

items.title: Beagle Puppy
items.description: Small to medium-sized hounds with excellent sense of smell. Curious, friendly, and energetic.

items.title: German Shepherd
items.description: Intelligent and versatile working dogs. Loyal, confident, and excellent guardians.

items.title: Labrador Retriever
items.description: Outgoing and friendly dogs that make wonderful companions. Great with children and easy to train.

items.title: Pomeranian
items.description: Small, fluffy dogs with fox-like faces. Vivacious, bold, and love to be the center of attention.

items.title: Dachshund (Miniature)
items.description: Long-bodied, short-legged dogs with playful personalities. Clever, lively, and courageous.

items.title: Shih Tzu
items.description: Toy dogs with long, flowing coats. Affectionate, outgoing, and bred to be companion animals.

items.title: Border Collie Puppy
items.description: Highly intelligent herding dogs with intense focus. Athletic, energetic, and excel at dog sports.

items.title: Cocker Spaniel
items.description: Medium-sized sporting dogs with silky coats. Gentle, happy, and make wonderful family pets.
